name: tonight-the-new-frontiers-at-the-exitin
title: Tonight: The New Frontiers At The Exit/In
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
We’re taking a field trip to the Exit/In tonight to see recent favorites The New Frontiers. Their debut album Mending is out on The Militia Group and we’re addicted. On a side note, can we just say that the Exit/In’s ticketing site is exponentially better since the last time we checked? We love you, Exit/In.

Anyway, we don’t know too much about the openers, but they’re from Nashville, and they call themselves The Kopecky Family Band. The folklorish bio and dreamy music coming from the seven members kind of makes us imagine them as a Snow White & the 6 Dwarves kind of schtick, so we’ll have to see how that turns out. 

Since we just spent most of this post talking about the opener instead of the band we’re going to see, check out this sampler from Absolutepunk featuring The New Frontiers’ cover of Gillian Welch’s “Look At Miss Ohio.” If you like it, join us at 9pm tonight for the show ($10; 18+). 

Photo by ararejul.
